entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is described as peering around at her students with her strangely enlarged eyes.

entities.name: mars
entities.description: Mars is mentioned as being placed most interestingly at the present time.

entities.name: solar system
entities.description: The solar system is described as a beautiful thing with planets and moons hanging in thin air beneath a glass dome.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney will examine the effects of Mars.
Professor Trelawney uses a miniature model of the solar system to demonstrate planetary divination.
